document_data.caption: ''Skydrop sample''
document_data.name: Skydrop
document_data.mainbody: '''Skydrop''' was the common name given to [[wikipedia:en:tektite|tektite]] material; fragments of glass of meteoric origin found beneath the shifting dunes of [[Anauroch]] and other deserts.
document_data.Description: Skydrop stones were usually clear to lightly shaded with a glassy luster. These stones were left uncut and merely polished and mounted in a claw setting as earrings and pendants. A typical specimen had a base value of 50 gp.
document_data.Powers: A creature touching, wearing, or carrying a skydrop gemstone was immune to petrification.
